alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; DuPage; Lake; McHenry; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 14 at 9:03PM CST until November 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow, including lake effect snow showers, with slushy accumulations on roadways expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Little to no snow accumulation is expected along the immediate Lake Michigan shoreline. * WHERE...McHenry, Lake IL, DuPage, Northern Cook and Central Cook Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions including during the Tuesday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates may exceed 1 inch per hour from late afternoon Tuesday to early Wednesday morning due to lake effect snow showers.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

area.areaDesc: Central Cook; DuPage; Lake; McHenry; Northern Cook
